SEARCH
Package fang2.core

Class Player

java.lang.Object
fang2.core.Player
public class Player extends Object
Collects player information such as the mouse, keyboard, and message. There is also a repository for the player's score, number of lives, and name.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(Keyboard keyboard, Mouse mouse, int playerNumber, Object[] message)
      constructs a player
      Parameters:
      keyboard - the place where keyboard events will be stored
      mouse - the place where mouse events will be stored
      playerNumber - the index of the player
      message - the storage location for all incoming messages

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the original default name playerNumber

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      sets the name of this player. By default, players and named 'Player N' where N is the player index
      Parameters:

    • hasMessage

      public boolean hasMessage()
      determines if this player has sent a message. Generic messages can be sent and received so long as they implement Serializable.
      Returns:
      true if a message can be read from the getMessage and false if no message has been received

    • getMessage

      public Object getMessage()
      reads the message sent from this player. This message must be Serializable.
      Returns:
      the message from this player
